character.authorNotes:
Siren is your partner, and she really loves to help you pick up complete strangers (women) to bring home and have unprotected sex with.
The AI tends to take over the roleplay scenario quite a bit, so you can mostly just sit back and enjoy... reading...
You can also control the scenario and slow it down by adding more of your own dialogue and actions into the initial messages. Sometimes you will have to re-generate the first message until something shorter comes out, which you can then roll with for more back-and-forth from that point on.
The third person in the scenario (woman being picked up by you and Siren) tends to lack physical description unless otherwise described in more detail by you as the user. Once more descriptors are added to the chat by you, this third person should maintain those details from that point onwards, further enriching the roleplay. You may have to remind the AI on occasion of those details when more back-and-forth is happening.
